summary: Adds a small chapel home near Morthal.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/UJ12AJk.png[/img][/center]
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/QtD7v94.png[/img][/url][/center]


This mod was a request, and as usual I'm happy to oblige :)

Windbreaker Chapel is a free home, based on the Whiterun Hall of the Dead, located near Morthal, with a map marker enabled. It is styled to look like a monastery of sorts, for the player who leans towards a life of peace and meditation in touch with the Divines.

The place is simple and bare, but not bland (at least in my opinion, hah!). There are some crops outside, protected from rough weather by some rocks. A small lean-to houses some livestock; there is a stable with a horse, a smelter, alchemy table, a chopping block and a sharpening wheel for you to use.

Inside, I placed some living quarters and a study/meditating area. There are, of course, shrines to all the Divines, benches, and a lectern. I even squeezed in your very own Hall of the Dead, with skeletons (that will not attack you) and a table for offerings.

The place is fully navmeshed, but since there's only one bed, bringing along followers to live with you may prove tricky (unless you make them sleep with the skeletons...)

To install, place the files in your 'SteamSteamAppsCommonSkyrimData' folder. Then activate the mod through your preferred launcher by ticking the checkbox next to the esp. Let me know if there are any problems!


[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/UJ12AJk.png[/img][/center]
author: Jokerine
